about_body: Ecosmart Electric serves commercial and residential clients with reliable, code-compliant electrical work. We focus on safe installations, clear communication, and energy-smart solutions with professional expertise you can trust.
svc1_d: Circuits, outlets, lighting, and dedicated lines.
svc2_d: Fault finding, breakers, GFCI/AFCI issues, safety fixes.
svc3_d: Service panels, sub-panels, load balancing, rewiring.
svc4_d: Smart switches, occupancy sensors, schedules & scenes.
svc6_d: EV chargers, appliances, dedicated circuits & more.
contact_lead: Get in touch for a quote or fast service.
